name: Reports::GeneralPatientFormStats_Test
description: Returns completed form data on patient provided

	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Pressure Ulcers']/items[at0009,'Mobility']/items[at0012]/value/value as ulcers_mobility_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Pressure Ulcers']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_action.v0,'2hr Skin Assessment']/items[at0030]/value/value as ulcers_2hskin_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Pressure Ulcers']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_action.v0,'2hr Position Change']/items[at0030]/value/value as ulcers_2hpostion_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Pressure Ulcers']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_action.v0,'Specific Matress']/items[at0030]/value/value as ulcers_matress_comment, " +

	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Pressure Ulcers']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_action.v0,'High Risk Care Plan']/items[at0030]/value/value as ulcers_hrplan_comment, " +

	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Moving and Handling']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_action.v0,'Medication Review']/items[at0030]/value/value as moving_medication_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Moving and Handling']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_action.v0,'Senior Review']/items[at0030]/value/value as moving_senior_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Moving and Handling']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_action.v0,'Identify and Communicate']/items[at0030]/value/value as moving_identity_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Moving and Handling']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_action.v0,'Moving and Handling Assessment']/items[at0030]/value/value as moving_assessment_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Moving and Handling']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_action.v0,'Equipment Provision']/items[at0030]/value/value as moving_provision_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Moving and Handling']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_action.v0,'Supervision Assessment']/items[at0030]/value/value as moving_supervision_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Moving and Handling']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_action.v0,'BP Lying and Standing Observation']/items[at0030]/value/value as moving_lyingbp_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Nutrition']/items[at0009,'Nil By Mouth']/items[at0012]/value/value as nutrition_nil_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Nutrition']/items[at0009,'Safe to Swallow']/items[at0012]/value/value as nutrition_safe_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Nutrition']/items[at0009,'Special Diet or Fluids']/items[at0012]/value/value as nutrition_diet_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Nutrition']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_action.v0,'IV Infusion']/items[at0030]/value/value as nutrition_iv_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Nutrition']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_action.v0,'Swallow Screen and Referral']/items[at0030]/value/value as nutrition_swallow_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Nutrition']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_action.v0,'Document Dietary Requirements']/items[at0030]/value/value as nutrition_dietary_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Discharge']/items[at0009,'Barriers to Discharge']/items[at0012]/value/value as discharge_barriers_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Discharge']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_action.v0,'JETT Referral']/items[at0030]/value/value as discharge_JETT_comment, " +
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Discharge']/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_action.v0,'Therapy Referral']/items[at0030]/value/value as discharge_therapy_comment " +
	"FROM EHR e " +
		"CONTAINS COMPOSITION c " +
		"CONTAINS EVALUATION i[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.generic_assessment_collection.v0]" +
		"WHERE c/name/value = 'High Impact Risk Assessment' " +
		"AND encounter_id = '" + encounterIDReplace + "' " +
		"ORDER BY c/context/start_time/value DESC  " +
		"OFFSET 0 LIMIT 1";

var aboutAQL = "SELECT c/context/start_time/value as about_completed, " +
	"c/context/other_context/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.encounter_context.v0, 'Encounter Context']/items[at0002]/value as encounter_id, " + 
	"i/data[at0001]/items[at0005]/value/value as assessment_comment, " + 
	"SQUASH(i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Communication']/items[at0009]/items[at0012]/value/value) as com_findings_comment, " + 
	"SQUASH(i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Communication']/items[at0015]/items[at0045]/value/value) as com_actions_comment, " + 
	"SQUASH(i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Personal Hygiene']/items[at0009]/items[at0012]/value/value) as hyg_findings_comment, " + 
	"SQUASH(i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Personal Hygiene']/items[at0015]/items[at0045]/value/value) as hyg_actions_comment, " + 
	"SQUASH(i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Nutrition and Hydration']/items[at0009]/items[at0012]/value/value) as nut_findings_comment, " + 
	"SQUASH(i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Nutrition and Hydration']/items[at0015]/items[at0045]/value/value) as nut_actions_comment, " + 
	"SQUASH(i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Sleep and Rest']/items[at0009]/items[at0012]/value/value) as sleep_findings_comment, " + 
	"SQUASH(i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Sleep and Rest']/items[at0015]/items[at0045]/value/value) as sleep_actions_comment, " + 
	"SQUASH(i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Elimination']/items[at0009]/items[at0012]/value/value) as elimination_findings_comment, " + 
	"SQUASH(i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Elimination']/items[at0015]/items[at0045]/value/value) as eliminations_actions_comment, " + 
	"SQUASH(i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Pain']/items[at0009]/items[at0012]/value/value) as pain_findings_comment, " + 
	"SQUASH(i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Pain']/items[at0015]/items[at0045]/value/value) as pain_actions_comment, " + 
	"SQUASH(i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Breathing and Circulation']/items[at0009]/items[at0012]/value/value) as breathing_findings_comment, " + 
	"SQUASH(i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.generic_assessment.v0,'Breathing and Circulation']/items[at0015]/items[at0045]/value/value) as breathing_actions_comment " +
		"FROM EHR e " + 
		"CONTAINS COMPOSITION c " +
		"CONTAINS EVALUATION i[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.generic_assessment_collection.v0]" +
		"WHERE c/name/value = 'About Me' " +
		"AND encounter_id = '" + encounterIDReplace + "' " +
		"ORDER BY c/context/start_time/value DESC  " +
		"OFFSET 0 LIMIT 1";

var bodyAQL = "SELECT c/context/start_time/value as body_completed, " +
		"c/context/other_context/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.encounter_context.v0, 'Encounter Context']/items[at0002]/value as encounter_id, " + 
		"i/data[at0001]/items[at0005]/value/value as assessment_comment, " +
		"SQUASH(i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.body_part_observation.v0]/items[at0009]/items[at0002]/value/value) as body_part_comment, " +
		"SQUASH(i/data[at0001]/items[at0006]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.body_part_observation.v0]/items[at0009]/items[at0003]/value/value) as body_part " +
		"FROM EHR e " + 
		"CONTAINS COMPOSITION c " +
		"CONTAINS EVALUATION i[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.generic_assessment_collection.v0]" +
		"WHERE c/name/value = 'Body Map' " +
		"AND encounter_id = '" + encounterIDReplace + "' " +
		"ORDER BY c/context/start_time/value DESC  " +
		"OFFSET 0 LIMIT 1";
		
var waterlowAQL = "SELECT i/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0015]/value/value as waterlow_risk, " +
						   "i/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0014]/value/magnitude as waterlow_score, " +
						   "c/context/start_time/value as waterlow_completed, " +
							"c/context/other_context/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.encounter_context.v0, 'Encounter Context']/items[at0002]/value as encounter_id, " + 
						"SQUASH(i/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0019]/value/value) as waterlow_comment, " +
						"SQUASH(d/data[at0002]/events[at0003]/data[at0001]/items[at0024]/value/value) as weight_any_comment, " +
						"SQUASH(d/data[at0002]/events[at0003]/data[at0001]/items[at0024]/value/value) as weight_reporting_comment, " +
						"SQUASH(v/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0018]/value/value) as height_any_comment, " +
						"SQUASH(v/protocol[at0007]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.reporting_status.v0]/items[at0002]/value/value) as height_reporting_comment, " +
						"SQUASH(x/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0012]/value/value) as bodymass_any_comment " +
					"FROM EHR e " +
					"CONTAINS COMPOSITION c " +
					"CONTAINS (OBSERVATION i[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.waterlow_score.v0] and OBSERVATION d[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.body_weight.v2] and OBSERVATION v[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.height.v2] and OBSERVATION x[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.body_mass_index.v2]) " +
					"WHERE encounter_id = '" + encounterIDReplace + "' " +
		            "ORDER BY c/context/start_time/value DESC  " +
					"OFFSET 0 LIMIT 1";
					
var diabetesAQL = "SELECT q/data[at0001]/items[at0028]/items[at0029]/value/value as diabetic_diabetes, " +
						"q/data[at0001]/items[at0031]/value/value as diabetic_referral, " +
						"c/context/start_time/value as diabetic_completed, " +
						"c/context/other_context/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.encounter_context.v0, 'Encounter Context']/items[at0002]/value as encounter_id, " + 
						"q/data[at0001]/items[at0027]/items[at0023]/value/value as additional_comment " +
					"FROM EHR e " +
					"CONTAINS COMPOSITION c " +
					"CONTAINS EVALUATION q[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.paitent_diabetes_foot_screening.v0] " +
					"WHERE encounter_id = '" + encounterIDReplace + "' " +
		                        "ORDER BY c/context/start_time/value DESC  " +
					"OFFSET 0 LIMIT 1";
					
var ccpAQL = "SELECT a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/items[at0005]/value/value as core_risk, " +
				"c/context/start_time/value as core_completed, " +
				"c/context/other_context/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.encounter_context.v0, 'Encounter Context']/items[at0002]/value as encounter_id, " + 
				"a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/items[at0005]/value/value as core_risk, " +
				"a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0017]/items[at0018]/items[at0023]/value/value as skin_comment, " +
				"a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0017]/items[at0024]/items[at0031]/value/value as surface_comment, " +
				"a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0017]/items[at0049]/items[at0054]/value/value as keep_comment, " +
				"a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0017]/items[at0055]/items[at0076]/value/value as incontinence_treatment_comment, " +
				"a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0017]/items[at0055]/items[at0057]/value/value as incontinence_comment, " +
				"a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0017]/items[at0062]/items[at0087]/value/value as nutrition_comment, " +
				"a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0017]/items[at0068]/items[at0082]/items[at0081]/value/value as patient_leaflet_comment, " +
				"a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0017]/items[at0099]/items[at0098]/value/value as patient_comment, " +
				"a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0017]/items[at0099]/items[at0098]/value/value as care_given_comment " +
			"FROM EHR e " +
			"CONTAINS COMPOSITION c " +
			"CONTAINS OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.ulcer_prevention_management.v0] " +
			"WHERE encounter_id = '" + encounterIDReplace + "' " +
		        "ORDER BY c/context/start_time/value DESC  " +
			"OFFSET 0 LIMIT 1";
			
var mustAQL = "SELECT q/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0016]/value/value as must_risk, " +
					   "q/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0015]/value/magnitude as must_score, " +
						"c/context/start_time/value as must_completed, " +		
						"c/context/other_context/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.encounter_context.v0, 'Encounter Context']/items[at0002]/value as encounter_id, " + 
						"SQUASH(w/data[at0002]/events[at0003]/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/value/value) as weight_quantity, " +
						"SQUASH(w/protocol[at0015]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.reporting_status.v0]/items[at0001]/value/value) as weight_input, " +
						"SQUASH(w/protocol[at0015]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.reporting_status.v0]/items[at0002]/value/magnitude) as weight_comment, " +
						"SQUASH(h/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value/value) as height_quantity, " +
						"SQUASH(h/protocol[at0007]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.reporting_status.v0]/items[at0001]/value/value) as height_input, " +
						"SQUASH(h/protocol[at0007]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.reporting_status.v0]/items[at0002]/value/magnitude) as height_comment, " +
						"SQUASH(m/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/value/value) as mangement_comment, " +
						"SQUASH(s/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0009]/value/value) as segment_comment, " +
						"SQUASH(a/items[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.body_weight.v2,'Body weight 3 to 6 months ago']/protocol[at0015]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.reporting_status.v0]/items[at0002]/value/value) as weight_loss_comment, " +
						"SQUASH(a/items[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.body_weight.v2,'Body weight 3 to 6 months ago']/data[at0002]/events[at0003,'Last 3 to 6 month ago']/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/value/magnitude) as weight_loss_prev_weight, " +
						"SQUASH(a/items[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.body_weight.v2,'Body weight 3 to 6 months ago']/protocol[at0015]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.reporting_status.v0]/items[at0001]/value/value) as weight_loss_prev_input, " +
						"SQUASH(a/items[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.absence.v2]/data[at0001]/items[at0005]/value/value) as weight_loss_absence_reason " +
				"FROM EHR e " +
				"CONTAINS COMPOSITION c  " +
				"CONTAINS (OBSERVATION q[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.must.v0] and EVALUATION m[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.management_guidelines.v0] or (OBSERVATION w[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.body_weight.v2] or OBSERVATION h[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.height.v2] or OBSERVATION s[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.body_segment_length.v0] or SECTION a[openEHR-EHR-SECTION.adhoc.v1,'Weight loss comparison'])) " +
				"WHERE encounter_id = '" + encounterIDReplace + "' " +
		                "ORDER BY c/context/start_time/value DESC  " +
				"OFFSET 0 LIMIT 1";
				
var fallsAQL = "SELECT k/data[at0002]/items[at0014]/value/value as falls_risk, " +
					   "c/context/start_time/value as falls_completed, " +

function getValueOrEmpty(val) {
    if(val != null) {
        return val;
    }
    return '';
}

function processHighRisk(encounter_id, baseQuery, results) {
	var query = highAQL;
	baseQuery.aql = query.replace(encounterIDReplace, encounter_id);
	baseQuery.callback = function (out, form) {
		results.high_risk = {
			encounter_id: encounter_id,
			completed: form.high_completed,
			comments: [
				{"assessment": getValueOrEmpty(form.assessment_comment)},
				{"infection_control": [
					{"infectious": getValueOrEmpty(form.infection_infectious_comment)},
					{"lived_abroad": getValueOrEmpty(form.infection_abroad_comment)},
					{"hospital_outside": getValueOrEmpty(form.infection_hospital_out_comment)},
					{"hospital_within": getValueOrEmpty(form.infection_hospital_in_comment)},
					{"travelled_outside": getValueOrEmpty(form.infection_travelled_comment)},
					{"household_cpe": getValueOrEmpty(form.infection_householdcpe_comment)},
					{"colonised_cpe": getValueOrEmpty(form.infection_colonisedcpe_comment)},
					{"mrsa_screening": getValueOrEmpty(form.infection_mrsa_comment)},
					{"patient_isolation": getValueOrEmpty(form.infection_isolation_comment)},
					{"specimen_collection": getValueOrEmpty(form.infection_specimen_comment)},
					{"rectal_swab": getValueOrEmpty(form.infection_rectal_comment)},
					{"mrsa_screening2": getValueOrEmpty(form.infection_mrsa2_comment)},
				]},
				{"pressure_ulcers": [
					{"existing_ulcer": getValueOrEmpty(form.ulcers_existing_comment)},
					{"paraglegia": getValueOrEmpty(form.ulcers_paraplegia_comment)},
					{"peripheral_neuropathy": getValueOrEmpty(form.ulcers_neuropathy_comment)},
					{"mobility": getValueOrEmpty(form.ulcers_mobility_comment)},
					{"skin_assessment": getValueOrEmpty(form.ulcers_2hskin_comment)},
					{"position": getValueOrEmpty(form.ulcers_2hposition_comment)},
					{"specific_matress": getValueOrEmpty(form.ulcers_matress_comment)},
					{"off_load_heels": getValueOrEmpty(form.ulcers_heels_comment)},
					{"high_risk_care_plan": getValueOrEmpty(form.ulcers_hrplan_comment)}
				]},
				{"moving_and_handling": [
					{"mobility_aids": getValueOrEmpty(form.moving_aids_comment)},
					{"techniques_and_equipment": getValueOrEmpty(form.moving_equip_comment)},
					{"previous_fall": getValueOrEmpty(form.moving_fall_comment)},
					{"cognitive_ability": getValueOrEmpty(form.moving_cognition_comment)},
					{"medication_review": getValueOrEmpty(form.moving_medication_comment)},
					{"senior_review": getValueOrEmpty(form.moving_senior_comment)},
					{"identify_and_communicate": getValueOrEmpty(form.moving_identity_comment)},
					{"moving_and_handling_assessment": getValueOrEmpty(form.moving_assessment_comment)},
					{"equipment_provision": getValueOrEmpty(form.moving_provision_comment)},
					{"supervision_assessment": getValueOrEmpty(form.moving_supervision_comment)},
					{"bp_lying_and_standing": getValueOrEmpty(form.moving_lyingbp_comment)}
				]},
				{"nutrition": [
					{"nil_by_mouth": getValueOrEmpty(form.nutrition_nil_comment)},
					{"safe_to_swallow": getValueOrEmpty(form.nutrition_safe_comment)},
					{"special_diet": getValueOrEmpty(form.nutrition_diet_comment)},
					{"iv_infusion": getValueOrEmpty(form.nutrition_iv_comment)},
					{"swallow_screen": getValueOrEmpty(form.nutrition_swallow_comment)},
					{"document_dietary_requirements": getValueOrEmpty(form.nutrition_dietary_comment)}
				]},
				{"discharge": [
					{"barriers_to_discharge": getValueOrEmpty(form.discharge_barriers_comment)},
					{"jett_referral": getValueOrEmpty(form.discharge_JETT_comment)},
					{"therapy_referral": getValueOrEmpty(form.discharge_therapy_comment)}
				]}
			]
		};
	};
	
	Ehr.allhash({forms: Ehr.query(baseQuery)}, function (res) {	});
	return results;
}

function processMovingEquipment(form) {
	var result = 'None';
	
	var equipArrays = [form.equip_bed_to_bed, 
						form.equip_emergency,
						form.equip_moving_up_down,
						form.equip_rolling,
						form.equip_seat_to_seat,
						form.equip_sit_stand,
						form.equip_sitting,
						form.equip_sitting_up,
						form.equip_walk];
	
	for(var i = 0; i < equipArrays.length; i++) {
		if(!isEmptyOrNoneRequired(equipArrays[i])) {
			return 'Yes';
		}
	}
		
	return result;
}

function isEmptyOrNoneRequired(equipment) {
	if(!equipment || equipment.length == 0) {
		return true;
	}
	
	for(var i = 0; i < equipment.length; i++) {
		if(!equipment[i].toLowerCase().startsWith('none')) {
			return false;
		}
	}
	
	return true;
}

function compute(ctx, src) {
	var encounter_id = ctx.vars.encounter_id;
	if(!encounter_id) {
		throw new Error('No encounter_id supplied');
	}
	
	// try {
		var results = {};
		var baseQuery = {
			aql: '',
			params: ctx.vars,
			initvalue: [],
			callback: null
		};
		
		var procs = [processHighRisk, processAboutMe, processBodyMap,
						processWaterlow, processDiabetes, processCCP, 
						processMUST, processFalls, processMoving,
						processRails];
						
		for(var i = 0; i < procs.length; i++) {
			results = procs[i](encounter_id, baseQuery, results);
		}
		
		return results;
	// } catch(ex) {
	//	throw new Error('exceptiion!: ' + ex.message + ex.stacktrace)
	// }
}
